app.title: Sacred Bells

welcome.description: Let the sacred sound of church bells guide you through the day

hero.title: Sacred Bells
hero.subtitle: Let the sacred rhythm of church bells guide your day

settings.title: Set your Bell Times
settings.shareBellsDescription: Bells have united communities for centuries, bring the sacred sound of church bells to your loved ones
settings.shareMessage: üîî Check out Sacred Bells! It's like having a church bell tower in your pocket. Beautiful way to mark the time throughout the day: {{url}}
settings.shareEmailSubject: A beautiful app I thought you'd appreciate
settings.shareEmailBody:
Hi,

I wanted to share something special with you. I've been using Sacred Bells, an app that recreates the traditional rhythm of church bells throughout the day.

It's been a wonderful way to stay connected to the sacred rhythm that churches have maintained for centuries.

I think you might enjoy it too!

Download: {{url}}

Blessings
